# Data Source (hush_mariadb_access_credential)

Use this data source to retrieve information about a MariaDB access credential in the Hush Security platform.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "hush_mariadb_access_credential" "example" {
  id = "acr-eu12345678"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the MariaDB access credential

### Read-Only

- `db_name` (String) The name of the MariaDB database
- `deployment_ids` (List of String) List of deployment IDs that can access this credential
- `description` (String) The description of the MariaDB access credential
- `host` (String) The hostname or IP address of the MariaDB server
- `kind` (String) The kind of access credential
- `name` (String) The name of the MariaDB access credential
- `port` (Number) The port number of the MariaDB server (default: 3306)
- `ssl_ca` (String) The SSL CA certificate for the MariaDB connection
- `ssl_mode` (String) The SSL mode for the MariaDB connection (default: preferred)
- `type` (String) The type of access credential
- `username` (String) The username for the MariaDB connection
